description: Ms. codex. Title provided by cataloger. Apparently European(?) paper, glossy. Ownership statements on fol. 51a, 116a. Origin: According to colophon, Text 6 copied on Wednesday 12 Muḥarram 1003 [September 1594] (fol. 63a).
author: Ḥusayn, Mullā, d. ca. 1673
contents: 1. fol. 1a-4b: Risālah mukhtaṣarah ikhtaṣarahā al-Munlā Ḥusayn min Risālatihi al-musammāh bi-al-Fawāʼīd al-fākhirah fī umūr al-ākhirah / Mullā Ḥusayn (d. ca. 1673).
2. fol. 5a-9a: al-Qaṣīdah al-ʻajībah wa-al-mufradah al-gharībah dhāt al-asʼilah al-mufḥamah wa-al-maʻānī al-muḥkamah / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad Ibn al-Khashshāb (11th-12th cent.).
3. fol. 10a-29a: Miṣbāḥ al-arwāḥ / [ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar al-Bayḍāwī, d. 1286?].
4. fol. 30a-44b: Kitāb al-Ḥurūf / Abū al-Ḥasan al-Muzanī.
5. fol. 45a-50b: Kitāb mukhtaṣar fī tajwīd al-Qurʼān / Mullā Ḥusayn (d. ca. 1673).
6. fol. 51a-63a: Nubdhah fī al-kalām ʻalá khuṭbat Mukhtaṣar al-shaykh Khalīl / Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Laqānī al-Mālikī [Muḥammad ibn Ḥasan al-Laqānī, d. 1550].
7. fol. 64a-72b: Urjūzat al-khawāṣṣ al-mujarrabah / al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs ʻAlī ibn Sīnā (d. 1037).
8. fol. 73a-85b: Shaqāʼiq al-utruj fī daqāʼiq al-ghunj / [al-Suyūṭī, d. 1505].
9. fol. 86a-115b: Kitāb fīhi khawāṣṣ al-aḥjār wa-al-yawāqīt wa-al-maʻādin mimmā nuqila min Kitāb khawāṣṣ al-aḥjār / [Aḥmad ibn Yūsuf al-Tīfāshī, d. 1253 or 4].
10. fol. 116a-123a: Muḥāḍarat al-ʻulamāʼ wa-muḥāwarat al-fuhamāʼ fī awḥad al-kubarāʼ wa-sayyid al-wuzarāʼ / ʻAlam al-Dīn Abī al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Sakhāwī (d. 1245).
extent: i, 123, i leaves : paper ; 250 x 148 mm. bound to 210 x 156 mm.
creator: Ḥusayn, Mullā, d. ca. 1673
حسين ملا
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Marbled paper over paper pasteboards. Rebacked with leather. Modern pastedowns and endpapers.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
